data.title: A Very Special Gallery
data.text: This gallery, once a beautiful old church was a great find! I attended a book signing of a tome about Old New Bedford, meet the authors and saw a brilliant art display. Quirky, highly original and really stunning art. The show was very well attended and I have great hopes that this gallery will be around for a very long time. The artist who created this place makes sculptures that are worth the visit. If you are in town, put this unique place on your to do list.

data.title: Funky & Eclectic
data.text:
This is a great gallery with a wide variety of shows. The exhibits change out frequently in both galleries. The upstairs gallery is large and wide open and includes a small gift store with some wonderful local art, mostly by members of this 25 year old arts cooperative. 

Downstairs i s the smaller, more intimate gallery. Given the frequency of the shows you may see outstanding and accomplished work in many media or, occasionally, in an open show like their annual Public Hanging, a wide variety from the amateur to the amazing. 

They also have many public events there and the facility is also one of the cheapest rentals in the area for events of your own.

data.title: Excellent Contemporary Art
data.text: Interesting and fun contemporary art, this gallery is a cornerstone in New Bedford's burgeoning art scene.
